aboutkompany.title1: – is one of the leading manufacturers of high-quality aerated concrete products in Uzbekistan. Our production plant is located in the Syrdarya region. Our mission is to provide the construction industry with innovative, eco-friendly, and durable building materials.
aboutkompany.title3: BS Gazobeton was established in early 2023. Since then, we have remained committed to the principles of quality and innovation in building materials. Our extensive experience in the construction industry has helped us grow into a trusted and successful brand. We offer products developed with modern technologies and made to meet the highest standards.
aboutkompany.title5: Our core mission is to supply Uzbekistan and Central Asian countries with premium, environmentally safe, and energy-efficient building materials. By combining cutting-edge technologies and strict quality control systems, we deliver products that are reliable and long-lasting.
aboutkompany.title7: BS Gazobeton operates a state-of-the-art production facility equipped with advanced machinery that meets international standards. Our production line is developed by the European company Aircrete and has an annual capacity of 450,000 cubic meters. We use only top-grade raw materials and manufacture products that comply with global standards.
aboutkompany.cardlist2: Aerated concrete is safe for both people and the environment.
aboutkompany.cardlist3: Our materials provide excellent thermal insulation
aboutkompany.cardlist5: We deliver personalized service based on individual needs
aboutkompany.title9: BS Gazobeton continues to strengthen its position in the Uzbek market by focusing on quality, reliability, and customer commitment. We are ready to become your trusted partner!

1.question: What is aerated concrete?
1.answer: Aerated concrete is a lightweight, porous construction material made from a mixture of cement, sand, lime, and water. The tiny air bubbles inside provide insulation and reduce weight.

2.question: Is a wall made of aerated concrete warm?
2.answer: Yes, aerated concrete has good thermal insulation.

3.question: Is aerated concrete fire-resistant?
3.answer: Yes, it is a fire-resistant and safe material.

4.question: Can it be damaged by moisture?
4.answer: If properly installed, it is protected from moisture.

5.question: What kind of adhesive should be used?
5.answer: There are special adhesives for aerated concrete that ensure strong bonding.

6.question: Can it be cut with a regular saw?
6.answer: Yes, it can be easily cut with a regular or special saw.

7.question: Is aerated concrete eco-friendly?
7.answer: It is made from fully natural raw materials and is environmentally friendly.

8.question: Is it durable?
8.answer: With proper care, aerated concrete lasts a long time.

9.question: Is it suitable for interior walls?
9.answer: Absolutely, it is suitable for both interior and exterior walls.

about.title2: is a lightweight, durable, and environmentally friendly building material known for its excellent thermal insulation. It is widely used in modern construction due to its versatility and performance.AAC is made from a mixture of quartz sand, cement, lime, aluminum powder, and water. It is cured in high-pressure autoclave chambers to achieve structural strength.

deliveryinfo.title: You can select the material and calculate the required amount for your construction, or get assistance from our specialists.
deliveryinfo.section1text: If visiting our office is inconvenient, you can place an order using the form on our website, specifying the product volume and your contact information. A manager will contact you and send you an invoice via email.
deliveryinfo.section1text2: Payment for goods can be made remotely, and services and components will be delivered directly to the construction site. You can also contact our manager at the following address: email info@bsgroup.uz for more information or consultation.
deliveryinfo.section2text: Delivery is available across all cities and regions. Depending on the minimum order quantity, delivery may be free or subject to a contract. Estimated delivery time — typically 1–2 business days.
deliveryinfo.section3text: You can get in-person advice from our specialists. To do so, please visit our company office. Our sales consultants will help you estimate and place your order.
deliveryinfo.bottomtext: If you have additional questions, feel free to call us or visit our office.
deliveryinfo.job: There are currently no job openings.

paymentinfo.title: After signing the contract, an invoice will be issued for payment, which can be received in two ways
paymentinfo.method1text: If necessary, individuals can make a purchase payment via bank transfer.
paymentinfo.method2text: We accept cash payments from individuals and legal entities at our sales offices.
paymentinfo.method3text: If needed, you can pay using PayMe / Click payment systems.
paymentinfo.method4text: If necessary, you can take advantage of installment payment options.

consultationinfo.subtitle: Not sure which size, density or quantity to choose?
consultationinfo.text: Through this service, you can get detailed advice on autoclaved aerated concrete products from the “BS gazobeton” brand, including their technical features and application methods. We will help you find the optimal solutions that suit your construction needs.
consultationinfo.bottomtext: If you have additional questions, feel free to call us or visit our office.

gazoblockinfo.title: If you're building with gas blocks, proper installation is the foundation of a strong and heat-retaining wall. We offer not just the product but a complete solution — professional gas block installation by experienced specialists.
gazoblockinfo.section1item1text: From foundation to roof installation of gas blocks.
gazoblockinfo.section1item2text: A team of experienced and trained construction workers.
gazoblockinfo.section1item3text: Installation with special adhesive that reduces heat loss.
gazoblockinfo.bottomtext: Construction quality depends on the workers you choose. Work with us — we guarantee reliable results.
gazoblockinfo.bottomtext2: Contact us now and order our professional installation service!

advantages.title: Advantages of aerated concrete
advantages.desc1: Much lighter than regular concrete, which reduces transportation and construction costs.
advantages.desc2: Aerated concrete has excellent heat retention, keeping warmth in winter and coolness in summer.
advantages.desc3: Despite being lightweight, it has good load-bearing capacity and long-term strength.
advantages.desc4: Aerated concrete is fire-resistant and withstands high temperatures, ensuring safety.
advantages.desc5: It contains no harmful substances, making it safe for health and environmentally friendly.
advantages.desc6: Easy to cut, drill, and shape, simplifying construction and saving time.
